document_data.name: Books and Scrolls
document_data.source: [[City of Delights|City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Books and Scrolls''' was a small shop located in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Books and Scrolls was jammed with all kinds of [[book]]s, [[scroll]]s, and [[map]]s. The items were not sorted into any convenient system of organization.
document_data.Activities:
[[Aziza|Aziza the Seer]] purchased volumes without worrying about their subject matter. As a member of the [[Readers]], she simply needed to read anything to power her strange magic.

Patient customers who were willing to spend hours digging through the mess of her shop could potentially be rewarded with stumbling across a rare tome containing forbidden magic or other wondrous lore.
document_data.Inhabitants: Aziza owned and operated this establishment.
